parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tail Brake Light Failure Due to Thermal Deformation
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the tail brake light can cause a safety hazard, as it may not function properly, leading to accidents or injuries. Additionally, the overheating of the lamp socket can lead to arcing of contacts and potentially cause a fire.
symptoms: The brake light fails to function
the brake light bulb melts
the tail lamp assembly needs to be replaced
the warning light on the dashboard indicates a lamp failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear brake lights can increase the risk of being struck from behind in traffic, potentially leading to accidents and injuries.
symptoms: Rear brake lights do not function or function intermittently
posing a potential danger to the driver and other road users.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The electrical system failure can cause a fire in the vehicle, potentially leading to serious injuries or fatalities, especially if occupants are trapped inside.
symptoms: Burning smell
smoke spiraling out of the windshield vents
sudden heat cut-off
and flames erupting from the front of the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The electrical system failure can cause various malfunctions, including brake light failures, heater blower shorts, and other electrical issues, potentially leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: Various electrical problems
including melted and burned components
intermittent functionality
and sudden failures.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electrochromic Self-Dimming Rear View Mirror Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrochromic self-dimming rear view mirror can cause the driver to be blinded by approaching headlights or lose rear view capability, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The mirror leaks fluid
the self-dimming feature fails to work
the mirror does not provide dimming against rear approaching headlights
the driver is blinded by headlights
the mirror becomes useless
the driver has to turn the mirror away
reducing rear view capability.
